# VNTextObservation

**Class**

Information about regions of text that an image-analysis request detects.

## Declaration

```swift
class VNTextObservation
```

## Overview

This type of observation results from a [doc://Vision/documentation/Vision/VNDetectTextRectanglesRequest]. It expresses the location of each detected character by its bounding box.

## Finding Individual Characters

- **characterBoxes**: An array of detected individual character bounding boxes.

## Text detection

- **VNDetectTextRectanglesRequest**: An image-analysis request that finds regions of visible text in an image.

## Inherits From

- VNRectangleObservation

## Conforms To

- CVarArg
- CustomDebugStringConvertible
- CustomStringConvertible
- Equatable
- Hashable
- NSCoding
- NSCopying
- NSObjectProtocol
- NSSecureCoding
- VNRequestRevisionProviding
